Gets a value from a given capability
String with capability name String with the value of a capability If the capability searched not exists thow an exception

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Prepares the User Agent and the needed variables. Fills the variable _hsAllCurrUserAgentCapabilities which has all capabilities of the given user agent
String with the user agent In real application you MUST use the prepareNavigatorModelCapabilities(Request), because this method is provided only for test purposes.
[jose] 25/05/2004 Created

Function getModelIdByUserAgent returns
User Agent string A string with the model id If not exists sets throws an exception
[jose] 03/02/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Function getStringCutBySpecialChars used for try to matching on progressively shorter user agent
A string with the user agent The user agent cutting at the rightest special characteer if the user agent is Nokia3300/1.0 (3.00) Profile/MIDP-1.0 Configuration/CLDC-1.0 returns Nokia3300/1.0 (3.00) Profile/MIDP-1.0 Configuration/CLDC-1
[jose] 03/02/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Project : wurflApi Class : capabilitiesGetter
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The class for get capabilities. In the constructor you must pass a deviceFileProcessor object
Getting the wurfl.xml from bin directoy and returns the value of max_image_width of the current request
Dim oDevProc As New wurflApi.deviceFileProcessor Dim oCapGet As New wurflApi.capabilitiesGetter(oDevProc) oCapGet.prepareNavigatorModelCapabilities(Request) Response.Write(oCapGet.getCapability("max_image_width"))
Getting the wurfl.xml from a given path and returns the value of all capabilities of the current request
Dim oDevProc As New wurflApi.deviceFileProcessor Dim oCapGet As New wurflApi.capabilitiesGetter(oDevProc) oCapGet.prepareNavigatorModelCapabilities(Request) Dim sdAllCaps As StringDictionary = oCapGet.getAllCapabilities Dim sRet As String For Each de As DictionaryEntry In sdAllCaps Response.Write("" + de.Key.ToString + "=" + de.Value.ToString + "
") Next
[jose] 29/06/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Load the wurfl file and create the capabilityMatrix
If wurflFilePath wasn't provided then applicationPath/bin/wurfl.xml assumed
[jose] 25/05/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The default path to wurfl file
String to the application/bin/wurfl.xml Used for try to find the wurfl file if the value of wurflFilePath in the configuration file was not valid or was not provided
[jose] 25/05/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Project : wurflApi Class : deviceFileProcessor
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Prepares all the variables used by the capabilitiesGetter class. There are two constructors. The first, without any parameters takes the path to the wurfl file from the bin directory of the application. In the second you pass the path
Without path
Dim oDevProc As New wurflApi.deviceFileProcessor()
Getting the path from the configuration file(Ex:web.config)
Dim oDevProc As New wurflApi.deviceFileProcessor(ConfigurationSettings.AppSettings("wurflFilePath"))
[jose] 25/05/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
